item.title: Daily Cloud Computing News from @cloudfeednet - Mar 15, 2017
item.description:
Daily Cloud Computing news from @cloudfeednet.

OpenStack platform deployments: Not every app is a candidate

“OpenStack is a great platform for 60% to 80% of the applications that a typical large business is running, but it’s not a solution for 100% of them,” said … more.

Taiwan startups creating platforms via Microsoft Visual Studio and cloud

Digitimes Wishing-Soft has developed three cloud services for the environmental safety market and the services are created via Microsoft Azure system and … more.

Amazon web users can pre-pay for SD2 cloud tech

… management services provider SD Squared (SD2) has launched a new product that will enable users of Amazon Web Services (AWS) to pre-pay for … more.

Blackmores plans major ERP cloud shift

Blackmores adopted its JDE Enterprise One solution in 2002, and is now seeking to shift it up to Microsoft Azure and potentially expand it across the … more.

Disaster recovery for applications, not just virtual machines using Azure

Azure Site Recovery is Microsoft’s single disaster recovery offering for applications that works with multiple native application-level replication … more.

On the move! Blue Chip Present the Microsoft Azure Discovery Roadshow

In order to help businesses learn more about Azure, Microsoft Gold Partner Blue Chip is holding a Microsoft Azure Discovery Roadshow in London, … more.

Wingu revamp redefines cloud in Africa

The revamped service delivers improvements such as simplified access to the OpenStack environment and Docker containers run in virtual machines … more.

OpenStack Private Cloud is Doing Just Fine

true? Well after some digging the answer appears to be yes and no. more.

Fpweb.net Joins Microsoft Cloud Solution Provider Program

As a Cloud Solution Provider program member, Fpweb.net provides SharePoint and SQL on Azure, and Office 365 managed by Fpweb.net. ST. LOUIS … more.

SingleHop Introduces Industry’s First Application-Driven Managed AWS

Marketwired (press release) … and managed hosting, today announced the official launch of its AWS managed services offering – Service First Support for Amazon Web Services. more.

Prysm Delivers Intelligent Cloud Solution Powered by Microsoft Azure

SAN JOSE, Calif., March 15, 2017 /PRNewswire/ – Prysm, Inc., has reaffirmed its commitment to Microsoft Azure with the announcement that its … more.

Microsoft Visual Studio 2017, Refining The Fundamentals

It is now a full 20-years since Microsoft first offered its Visual Studio software … Microsoft makes much of the use of its own IntelliSense technology in … and services to [the Microsoft] Azure [cloud], directly from the IDE,” wrote Liuson, … more.

Socius Offers Complimentary Workshops to Assess Azure Readiness

DUBLIN, Ohio, March 15, 2017 /PRNewswire/ – Socius, a multiple award winning Microsoft Cloud Solutions Provider and consulting company, … more.

Telehouse launches Cloud Link connectivity exchange

The new Cloud Link service will be officially available from April with cloud connectivity service Microsoft Azure ExpressRoute through a direct … more.

Amazon Web Services starts offering free cloud storage and computing for

GeekWire Amazon Web Services will offer $100 in promotional credit and up to an additional $100/month to cover any extra cloud computing and storage costs … more.

Can Oracle Keep Up Its Cloud Revenue Growth In The Third Quarter?

Amazon Web Services reported $3.53 billion in revenue for Q4 2016, up 47% from Q4 2015. To put that into perspective, Amazon’s cloud business is … more.

Microsoft Dynamics 365 customer engagement roadmap prioritizes integration,

MSDynamicsWorld.com … engagement roadmap prioritizes integration, strategic use of Azure services … Microsoft kicked off eXtreme365 in Lisbon with a rundown of new and … more.

HealthGrid Adds Microsoft Power BI to Patient Engagement Platform

HealthGrid has worked with Microsoft since 2015 to bring its innovative, healthcare-specific mobile patient engagement platform onto Microsoft Azure. more.

10 ways Google improved its cloud at NEXT

By comparison, Microsoft Azure has 34 regions and AWS has 42 Availability Zones across 16 regions (each AWS region has at least two Availability … more.

MS Azure Support Technician - Valencia, Spain

Envoyez votre candidature, sans tarder, si cette annonce vous intresse. more.

Microsoft hybrid cloud platform to power Andhra Pradesh data centre

We have entered into an agreement with Microsoft for use of Azure Stack. There are about 340 applications including Mee Seva, Core Dashboard … more.

Amazon at SXSW: Tech giant promotes drones, original TV series, AWS, and

GeekWire Several members from the Amazon Web Services team were in Austin sporting Keep Amazon Weird t-shirts, a variation of the Keep Austin Weird … more.

Microsoft announces new capabilities of HDInsight and DocumentDB

At Strata + Hadoop World San Jose today, Microsoft is announcing several … Microsoft is also updating Apache Spark for Azure HDInsight with new … more.

Huawei becomes platinum member of OpenStack Foundation

Chinese information and communications technology (ICT) solutions provider Huawei has been selected as a platinum member of the OpenStack … more.
